mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, member_id, game_no, added_date) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{gameNo}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.game_no, c.added_date, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_price AS gamePrice, MIN(gI.attachment_no) AS attachmentNo FROM cart c JOIN game g ON c.game_no = g.game_no LEFT JOIN game_image gI ON g.game_no = gI.game_no WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.game_no, c.added_date, g.game_title, g.game_price
